title: HELP!
body:
i have now tried to start league on my computer, but it keeps on saying that i cant connect to the HTTP server. 
i have tried to:
-Restart my computer
-restart the internet on the computer
-restart the internet box
-start league as a priority
-taken off the fire wall

i dont know what else to do!
does someone else have the same problem?

replies.body: You may have a network issue or settings on your OS that's blocking you from connecting to the servers.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure some settings like your firewalls.  This should help out!

> [{quoted}](name=xXEmilzzx00Xx,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EHgFFtjy,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-03T21:18:17.915+0000)
